attributes.action: To allow pets into emergency/temporary accommodation.
attributes.additional_details: We want them to change this because giving up a pet which is loved by their owners so very much and are a member of the family, they help people with health issues and are loved like a child in almost every family. You would not ask someone to give up a child to live in a place that they have no control over. People give up pets every day just so they them selfs are not homeless leaving a devastating mark on the ones mental health. So please think of people in this situation and lift a spirit.
attributes.background: I want them to change the laws on allowing pets to live in emergency/temporary accommodation with their families and not have the owners be made to give up a member of their family.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual landlords and property owners.
